##  Test brms (c.f. Mark Andrews fbda01)  

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(brms)

data_df <- tibble(x = rnorm(10))

M <- brm(x ~ 1, data = data_df)
```


### priorexposure  

The`*priorexposure*` package is a small ad hoc package just for this tutorial. It is available on GutHub and can be installed as follows using *devtools*: 

```{r}
devtools::install_git("https://github.com/mark-andrews/fbda01.git", subdir = "priorexposure")
```

### Restart R and check that Rtools is working:  

```{r}
pkgbuild::has_build_tools(debug = TRUE)
```
